titles.title: National Historic Preservation Act Amendment Act of 2013

A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act to make Hispanic-serving institutions eligible for technical and financial assistance for the establishment of preservation training and degree programs.
National Historic Preservation Act Amendment Act of 2013

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: National Historic Preservation Act Amendment Act of 2013 - Amends the National Historic Preservation Act to make Hispanic-serving institutions eligible for technical and financial assistance to establish preservation training and degree programs.
